Builiding reset society

Living better and sustainably can be done in several different ways. Our objective targets several aspects of life that can be improved, which form the pieces of the puzzle we need put together to achieve our goals:

  • Surroundings

    Living in a place with a lovely weather, good food and quick access to awesome regions.

  • Working better

    Less stress, less commute, more oportunities to improve professionally.

  • Food & Energy

    Using ecologically and mostly locally produced food & energy.

  • Social enterprises

    Promoting companies with social goals and ethical backgrounds.

  • Tech innovation

    Living in a place where technological innovation thrives.

  • ?

    Your ideas, it is impossible to come up with a working model without them.

  • Surroundings

    We spent several months selecting the perfect place to start this project until we finally chose Rincon de la Victoria. We ended with a place with:

    • Great weather
    • Awesome food
    • A great beach
    • Good housing prices
    • Close to mountains, forests and snow
    • Close transport hubs

  • Working better

    We want to promote ways to work that result in a better quality of life and proffesional development.

    We are organising a number of projects to promote:

    • Coworking spaces
    • Talks and workshops
    • Reduced commute
    • Conferences
    • And more to come…

  • Food & Energy

    Using ecologically and mostly locally produced food & energy:

    • Consumming locally produced food
    • Consuming food with a low environmental footprint
    • Producing our own food using permaculture techniques and aquaponics
    • Consuming 100% renewable energy
    • Producing our own renewable energy
    • And more to come…

  • Social enterprises

    Promoting companies with social goals and ethical backgrounds:

    • Buying goods and services from ethical providers
    • Actively participating in networks supporting social enterprise
    • Stimulating cooperation between social actors
    • Offering advice and help to social enterprises
    • Boosting the development of social enterprises
    • Developing circular economy systems in the region

  • Tech innovation

    Living in a place where technological innovation thrives, which we trigger with:

    • Talks and workshops
    • Hackathons
    • Accelerator programmes
    • Coworking spaces
    • Testing, using and promoting innovative solutions
    • Knowledge exchange communities

  • ?

    Your ideas, it is impossible to come up with a working model without them.

    • Innovative ideas
    • Not that innovative but efficient ideas
    • Tech-oriented ideas
    • Good ideas
    • More ideas
    • Tell us about your ideas

Join us

Register here to receive monthly newsletter (if we are able to produce enough quality content). We promise we won't spam.

Apply to the first community

During this phase of the project we are looking for people that can participate in our coworking for themselves and have the hability to create more openings and resources over time. Senior and medior developers and designers usually fit this profile best.

If you are able to produce resources in any other way or you are an excellent Quality of Life provider, feel free to send us an open application. But please bear in mind we are very few people in this early stage :)
